description.en:
Lympo is a sports and health ecosystem powered by priceless user-generated and user-controlled data which can help generate exponential returns for industry stakeholders and users alike.

Lympo has collected more than $5,500,000.00 in first 7 days of its token pre-sale. We are backed by the biggest block-chain names such as Sonic Zhang, Bill Angelidis, Antanas Guoga and others.

ico_data.short_desc: Monetizing sports and health data via blockchain

status_updates.description: We thank our community for support! After endless sleepless nights and a lot of work, we have successfully launched our app in the U.S., together with our partners the Dallas Mavericks and their owner Mark Cuban. More updates on our Twitter! https://twitter.com/lympo_io
Only a few weeks left until the official Lympo launch event in the U.S. with the Dallas Mavericks and Mark Cuban! We have set up a countdown you can follow, see it at www.lympo.io 👈

On October 31, 10:00 AM (GMT+3), we will announce some news and immediately after, an AMA session will take place on Lympo's Telegram channel with CEO Ada Jonuse, to answer all your questions. 
Don't miss out and join our telegram now! 👉https://t.me/lympo
